fields.description: Enable this to show the project on the homepage.

fields.description: A smaller number means higher priority (e.g., 1 will be shown before 2).

fields.description: A valid web, email, phone, or relative link.

fields.description: Is project mein use hui technologies select karein.

fields.description: Team ke andar member kis order mein dikhega. Chota number pehle (President ko 1, VP ko 2).

fields.description: E.g., 5 (for 5 minutes). Sirf number daalein.

fields.description: Enable this to show this roadmap on the homepage.

fields.description: A smaller number (like 1, 2) will appear higher up on the homepage.

fields.title: Homepage Display Order

fields.description: Is roadmap ko ek ya ek se zyada category se jodein aur har category ke liye order set karein.
Is category ke andar yeh roadmap kaunse number par dikhega? (e.g., 1, 2, 3)
fields.name: displayOrder
fields.title: Display Order in this Category

fields.name: categories

fields.description: Roadmap ke liye ek catchy one-liner.

fields.description: Yeh roadmap kiske baare mein hai? (Yeh card par dikhega)
fields.name: description
fields.title: Short Description

fields.description: Roadmap ke card par dikhne waali image.

fields.description: Bullet points mein batayein ki student kya seekhega.

fields.description: E.g., "Module 1: Foundations of Web Development"

fields.description: Is module mein kya seekhenge?

E.g., "Understanding HTML Structure" ya "Styling with CSS"
